nodes.id: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

zh-cn: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举
第4届香港特别行政区行政长官选举

location.en: Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四届行政长官选举，由1200人组成的选举委员会选出行政长官，最终梁振英以689票当选。
description.en: The 4th Chief Executive election of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, where the Chief Executive was elected by a 1,200-member Election Committee. Leung Chun-ying was ultimately elected with 689 votes.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举当选人。曾任香港特别行政区行政会议非官守议员召集人。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, elected in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election. He previously served as the Convenor of the Non-official Members of the Executive Council of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举候选人。曾任香港特别行政区政务司司长、财政司司长。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, candidate in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election. He previously served as Chief Secretary for Administration and Financial Secretary of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举候选人。时任民主党主席及立法会议员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, candidate in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election. At the time, he was the chairman of the Democratic Party and a member of the Legislative Council.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院总理，签署了任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官的国务院令。
description.en: Chinese politician, then-Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who signed the State Council order appointing Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央总书记及国家主席，为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。
description.en: Chinese politician, then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC, who administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government.

description.zh-cn: 指梁振英竞选团队成员与乡绅及江湖人物郭永鸿（上海仔）的会面，引发“黑金政治”的疑虑。
description.en: Refers to a meeting between members of Leung Chun-ying's campaign team, rural leaders, and triad figure Kwok Wing-hung ("Shanghai Tsai"), which raised concerns about "black-gold politics".

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，梁振英竞选办公室主要成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, a key member of Leung Chun-ying's campaign office.

description.zh-cn: 被指为香港江湖人物，曾与梁振英竞选团队成员在流浮山小桃园饭局会面。
description.en: Alleged Hong Kong triad figure who met with members of Leung Chun-ying's campaign team at the Lau Fau Shan "Little Peach Garden" dinner.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年香港行政长官选举期间，候选人唐英年位于九龙塘的大宅被揭发有大型僭建地库，引发诚信争议。
description.en: Refers to the controversy during the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election where candidate Henry Tang's mansion in Kowloon Tong was discovered to have a large illegal basement, sparking a debate over his integrity.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，新民党主席，曾考虑并短暂宣布参选2012年香港行政长官选举，但未能取得足够提名。
description.en: Hong Kong politician, chairwoman of the New People's Party, who considered and briefly announced her candidacy for the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election but failed to secure enough nominations.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中共中央总书记。据传其曾“钦点”唐英年为2012年香港特首人选。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. It was rumored that he had "handpicked" Henry Tang as the preferred candidate for the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，长实集团创办人。在2012年香港行政长官选举中提名唐英年。
description.en: Hong Kong businessman, founder of Cheung Kong Group. He nominated Henry Tang in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 香港亲建制派政党，主要代表工商界利益。
description.en: A pro-establishment political party in Hong Kong, primarily representing business and professional interests.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一项政治诉求，旨在争取在2012年实现香港行政长官和立法会全体议员由普选产生。该建议未被中央政府接纳。
description.en: A political demand aimed at achieving universal suffrage for both the Hong Kong Chief Executive and all members of the Legislative Council in 2012. The proposal was not accepted by the Central Government.

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月1日由民间人权阵线主办的游行，主要诉求之一为要求新上任的行政长官梁振英下台。
description.en: A protest organized by the Civil Human Rights Front on July 1, 2012, with one of its main demands being the resignation of the newly inaugurated Chief Executive, Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任国家副主席及中央港澳工作协调小组组长。其在全国政协会议期间与梁振英阵营委员的互动被外界解读为对梁的支持。
description.en: Chinese politician, then-Vice President of the PRC and head of the Central Coordination Group for Hong Kong and Macau Affairs. His interaction with a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp during the National People's Congress was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of support for Leung.

description.zh-cn: 负责选举香港特别行政区行政长官的选举团体。
description.en: The electoral college responsible for electing the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 2007年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

zh-cn: 2007年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 2012年香港特首选举之前的上一届选举。
description.en: The election preceding the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

nodes.id: 2017年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

zh-cn: 2017年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 2012年香港特首选举之后的下一届选举。
description.en: The election following the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区行政长官

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区及香港特别行政区政府的首长职位。
description.en: The position of the head of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 梁振英在该次选举中获得689票，成功当选为第四任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying won the election with 689 votes, successfully becoming the fourth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 唐英年在该次选举中获得285票，未能当选。
description.en: Henry Tang received 285 votes in the election and was not elected.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 何俊仁在该次选举中获得76票，未能当选。
description.en: Albert Ho received 76 votes in the election and was not elected.

description.zh-cn: 两人在2012年香港行政长官选举中是主要竞争对手，选战过程激烈。
description.en: The two were major rivals in the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, which was a fierce contest.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

position.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四任行政长官
position.en: The fourth-term Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 国务院召开全体会议，任命梁振英为香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。
description.en: The State Council held a plenary session and appointed Leung Chun-ying as the fourth-term Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝签署了任命梁振英为香港第四任行政长官的国务院令。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao signed the State Council order appointing Leung Chun-ying as the fourth Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记、国家主席胡锦涛为梁振英及香港第四届政府主要官员监誓。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC, Hu Jintao, administered the oath of office for Leung Chun-ying and the principal officials of the fourth-term Hong Kong government.

description.zh-cn: 梁振英竞选团队成员与江湖人物的饭局被曝光，引发了对其“黑金政治”的负面批评。
description.en: A dinner meeting between members of Leung Chun-ying's campaign team and a triad figure was exposed, leading to negative criticism of him regarding "black-gold politics".

description.zh-cn: 在流浮山小桃园饭局中会面，为梁振英的选举向乡绅拉票。
description.en: Met at the Lau Fau Shan "Little Peach Garden" dinner to canvass votes from rural leaders for Leung Chun-ying's election.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年被揭发其住宅存在大型僭建，引发诚信危机，严重打击其选情。
description.en: It was revealed that Henry Tang's residence had a large illegal structure, triggering a crisis of integrity that severely damaged his election campaign.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年的僭建丑闻使其民望大跌，客观上为竞争对手梁振英创造了更有利的选举形势。
description.en: Henry Tang's illegal structure scandal caused his popularity to plummet, objectively creating a more favorable election situation for his rival, Leung Chun-ying.

description.zh-cn: 叶刘淑仪曾公开狠批唐英年从政多年“毫无建树”。
description.en: Regina Ip once publicly and harshly criticized Henry Tang for having "achieved nothing" after many years in politics.

description.zh-cn: 叶刘淑仪曾不点名批评梁振英无管治经验，由他治港风险极高。
description.en: Regina Ip once implicitly criticized Leung Chun-ying for lacking governance experience, stating that it would be extremely risky for him to govern Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 盛传唐英年早获前中共中央总书记江泽民钦点为2012年的新一届特首。
description.en: It was widely rumored that Henry Tang had been handpicked by former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin to be the new Chief Executive in 2012.

description.zh-cn: 作为选举委员会委员，李嘉诚提名唐英年参选行政长官。
description.en: As a member of the Election Committee, Li Ka-shing nominated Henry Tang for the Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 自由党宣布党内29名选委一致支持唐英年参选特首。
description.en: The Liberal Party announced that its 29 members on the Election Committee would unanimously support Henry Tang's candidacy for Chief Executive.

description.zh-cn: 泛民主派提出的“2012年双普选”建议最终没有被中央政府接纳。
description.en: The "dual universal suffrage in 2012" proposal put forward by the pan-democrats was ultimately not accepted by the Central Government.

description.zh-cn: 在梁振英就职当日，民间人权阵线主办的七一大游行，主要诉求之一为要求梁振英下台。
description.en: On the day of Leung Chun-ying's inauguration, one of the main demands of the July 1st protest organized by the Civil Human Rights Front was for his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 时任国家副主席习近平在会见港澳政协委员时，先与梁振英阵营的委员刘梦熊握手，此举被外界解读为中央政府对梁振英的支持。
description.en: Then-Vice President Xi Jinping's handshake with Lew Mon-hung, a member of Leung Chun-ying's camp, during a meeting with Hong Kong and Macau CPPCC members was interpreted by outsiders as a sign of the central government's support for Leung.

relationships.target: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 选举委员会是负责选出香港特别行政区行政长官的机构，其成员投票决定了选举结果。
description.en: The Election Committee is the body responsible for electing the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong SAR, and its members' votes determined the outcome of the election.

relationships.source: 2007年香港特别行政区行政长官选举
relationships.target: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 2007年的选举是2012年选举的前一届，为后者提供了政治背景和连续性。
description.en: The 2007 election was the immediate predecessor to the 2012 election, providing political context and continuity.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举
relationships.target: 2017年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 2012年的选举结果和过程影响了香港的政治生态，并为2017年的选举提供了背景。
description.en: The outcome and process of the 2012 election influenced Hong Kong's political landscape and provided the context for the 2017 election.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 梁振英在2012年选举中获胜，成为第四任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Leung Chun-ying won the 2012 election to become the fourth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong SAR.
